com.fisherevans.fizzics

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fisherevans.fizzics.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple 2D physics world that updates rectangle positions based on time and colliding rectangles

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(float gravity)
      Creates the world starting with a supplied gravity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGlobalCollisionListener(GlobalCollisionListener listener)
      adds a new global collision listener
      void addRectangle(Rectangle newRec)
      Adds a rectangle to the addition queue.
      java.util.List<Rectangle> getRectangles()
      Gets the current list of rectangles in this world
      void removeGlobalCollisionListener(GlobalCollisionListener listener)
      removes a collision listener
      void removeRectangle(Rectangle oldRec)
      Adds a rectangle to the deletion queue.
      void setGravity(float gravity)
      changes this world's gravity
      void step(float delta)
      adds and removes rectangles in queue updates the rectangles' in the world velocity based on gravity iterates each rectangle's position based on it's current velocity detects and resolves collisions between rectangles

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • World

        public World(float gravity)
        Creates the world starting with a supplied gravity.
        Parameters:
        gravity - the y acceleration for non static objects

    • Method Detail

      • addRectangle

        public void addRectangle(Rectangle newRec)
        Adds a rectangle to the addition queue. The rectangle will not be added to the world until the next step();
        Parameters:
        newRec - the new rectangle

      • removeRectangle

        public void removeRectangle(Rectangle oldRec)
        Adds a rectangle to the deletion queue. The rectangle will not be removed from the world until the next step();
        Parameters:
        oldRec - the old rectangle

      • getRectangles

        public java.util.List<Rectangle> getRectangles()
        Gets the current list of rectangles in this world
        Returns:
        the list of rectangles in this world

      • step

        public void step(float delta)
        adds and removes rectangles in queue updates the rectangles' in the world velocity based on gravity iterates each rectangle's position based on it's current velocity detects and resolves collisions between rectangles
        Parameters:
        delta - the time delta since the last step in seconds

      • setGravity

        public void setGravity(float gravity)
        changes this world's gravity
        Parameters:
        gravity - the new y acceleration

      • addGlobalCollisionListener

        public void addGlobalCollisionListener(GlobalCollisionListener listener)
        adds a new global collision listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the new listener

      • removeGlobalCollisionListener

        public void removeGlobalCollisionListener(GlobalCollisionListener listener)
        removes a collision listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the old collision listener
